title: Arches National Park: Planning for a Hike
body: Planning for a Hike, page 1       In this activity, you are preparing to go on a hike for 2 hours and the temperature is 100 degrees Fahrenheit or 38 degrees Celsius.  Look at the items below and choose what are you going to take for your hike. Try to pack light by only taking what you need.               After you have made your list of what items you need to take on your hike, click here to check your answers.
